import React from "react" import PropTypes from "prop-types" import image from "../../../assets/images/food.jpg" import "../../../assets/stylesheets/restaurants/food_items.css" const FoodItems = (props) => { return (
{props.restaurant.name}
{props.restaurant.spaciality}
{props.restaurant.area}
{props.food_items.map((item, index)=>(

{item.name}

Rs. {item.price}

{item.description}

ADD
))}
) } export default FoodItems
